com.qubecell.ui
Class BaseActivity

java.lang.Object
  Activity
      com.qubecell.ui.BaseActivity
Direct Known Subclasses:
DialogActivity, ResultActivity, SelectOperatorActivity, ValidateOTPActivity
public class BaseActivity
extends Activity

The BaseActivity class need to be extended by all the child activity classes.

Author:
Vikram
